metadata.name: DLL Search Order Hijackig Via Additional Space in Path
metadata.comment: Detects when an attacker create a similar folder structure to windows system folders such as (Windows, Program Files...) but with a space in order to trick DLL load search order and perform a "DLL Search Order Hijacking" attack

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND (startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\\\windows \\\\')) OR startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\\\program files \\\\')) OR startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\\\program files (x86) \\\\'))) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.dll')))

output.summary: Detects when an attacker create a similar folder structure to windows system folders such as (Windows, Program Files...) but with a space in order to trick DLL load search order and perform a "DLL Search Order Hijacking" attack
